site.name: Blue
site.description: Blue is a powerful platform to create, manage, and scale processes.
site.author: Blue Team

home.title: Blue - Powerful Process Management Platform
home.description: Blue revolutionizes how teams collaborate and manage their work. Built for the modern workplace, our platform combines powerful project management tools with intuitive design.

about.title: About Blue - Modern Team Collaboration Platform
about.description: Learn more about Blue and how we're revolutionizing team collaboration and process management for modern workplaces.

company/about.title: About
company/about.description: Discover Blue's mission to transform how teams work together and manage their processes with our innovative platform.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the Blue plan that fits your team's needs. Simple, transparent pricing with no hidden fees. Start your free trial today.

platform/changelog.title: Changelog
platform/changelog.description: Stay up to date with the latest features and improvements in Blue.

resources/faq.title: FAQ
resources/faq.description: Frequently asked questions about Blue. Find answers to common questions about our platform, features, and pricing.

platform/status.title: System Status
platform/status.description: Monitor Blue's platform status and service uptime in real-time. View the current operational status and 90-day uptime history for all Blue services including API, web app, and background services.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: Stay informed with Blue's latest insights on process management, product updates, engineering practices, and modern workplace trends. Expert perspectives on scaling teams and optimizing workflows.

platform/roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
platform/roadmap.description: Track Blue's development progress and see what's coming next. View upcoming features, current development status, and planned improvements to the platform.

customers.title: Our Customers
customers.description: Watch real customer testimonials and success stories.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Blue is designed to scale with your business. We've built a platform that can handle the most complex workflows and processes.

brand.title: Brand Guidelines
brand.description: Explore Blue's brand guidelines including typography, visual identity, and brand assets. Learn how to properly use Blue's brand elements.

company.title: Company
company.description: Learn about Blue's company, our team, and our mission to revolutionize process management for modern teams.

solutions/industry/solopreneurs.title: Project Management for Solopreneurs
solutions/industry/solopreneurs.description: Streamline your solo business with Blue's powerful project management platform. Manage clients, projects, tasks, and workflows in one simple solution designed for solopreneurs.

platform/api.title: API
platform/api.description: Access Blue's powerful API for seamless integration and automation.

platform/download.title: Download
platform/download.description: Download Blue for your platform and start managing processes efficiently.

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: Explore Blue's comprehensive platform features and capabilities.

platform/integrations.title: Integrations
platform/integrations.description: Connect Blue with your favorite tools and services for seamless workflow integration.

platform/security.title: Security
platform/security.description: Learn about Blue's enterprise-grade security features and compliance standards.

platform/white-label.title: White Label
platform/white-label.description: Customize Blue with your brand for a seamless white-label experience.

platform/features.title: Features
platform/features.description: Discover all the powerful features Blue offers for process management.

platform/features/activity.title: Activity
platform/features/activity.description: Track all activities and updates across your projects and processes.

platform/features/ai.title: AI
platform/features/ai.description: Leverage AI-powered features to automate and optimize your workflows.

platform/features/audit-trails.title: Audit Trails
platform/features/audit-trails.description: Maintain complete audit trails for compliance and accountability.

platform/features/automations.title: Automations
platform/features/automations.description: Create powerful automations to streamline your workflows.

platform/features/calendar.title: Calendar
platform/features/calendar.description: Manage schedules and deadlines with integrated calendar views.

platform/features/chat.title: Chat
platform/features/chat.description: Collaborate in real-time with integrated team chat.

platform/features/custom-fields.title: Custom Fields
platform/features/custom-fields.description: Create custom fields to capture exactly the data you need.

platform/features/dashboards.title: Dashboards
platform/features/dashboards.description: Visualize your data with customizable dashboards and reports.

platform/features/database.title: Database
platform/features/database.description: Powerful database capabilities for managing structured data.

platform/features/docs.title: Docs
platform/features/docs.description: Create and collaborate on documents within your projects.

platform/features/file-management.title: File Management
platform/features/file-management.description: Organize and manage files across all your projects.

platform/features/forms.title: Forms
platform/features/forms.description: Build custom forms to collect data and automate processes.

platform/features/kanban-board.title: Kanban Board
platform/features/kanban-board.description: Visualize workflows with flexible Kanban boards.

platform/features/list.title: List
platform/features/list.description: Organize tasks and items in customizable list views.

platform/features/map.title: Map
platform/features/map.description: Visualize location-based data with integrated mapping.

platform/features/pdf-generation.title: PDF Generation
platform/features/pdf-generation.description: Generate professional PDFs from your data and documents.

platform/features/records.title: Records
platform/features/records.description: Manage records with powerful database capabilities.

platform/features/templates.title: Templates
platform/features/templates.description: Save time with reusable templates for common processes.

platform/features/timeline-gantt-charts.title: Timeline Gantt Charts
platform/features/timeline-gantt-charts.description: Plan and track projects with timeline and Gantt chart views.

platform/features/user-permissions.title: User Permissions
platform/features/user-permissions.description: Control access with granular user permissions and roles.

platform/features/views.title: Views
platform/features/views.description: Create custom views to see your data exactly how you need it.

platform/features/wiki.title: Wiki
platform/features/wiki.description: Build a knowledge base with integrated wiki functionality.

platform/features/workspaces.title: Workspaces
platform/features/workspaces.description: Organize projects and teams with dedicated workspaces.
